description:
the clicks are being registered (greys up then reurns to normal) but nothing happens - tried it on the web as well, same results

using Ubuntu 22.04

Unfortunately, interaction not working with ubuntu22. As stated by others, very slow response time, and links to webpages are working. However the app is unable to interface with iheart for capable use. Perhaps a future update? I hope so. I would really like to use iheart without the browser. A+ for effort. C- for execution. So... only 2 stars.
